text:
I would love to see a new WC champ‚Ä¶anyone other than Brazil, France, England, the usual suspects. Don‚Äôt have anything against them, it would just be cool to see someone else win.

Maybe the next Kimmich, KDB, Neuer, Courtois, etc. will come out of Japan, Morocco, Senegal, etc.
